author: paul

review: We now have several of these little thumb drives around the house.  We borrowed one from a coworker to try it out and thought it was just okay, the only complaint was that the sound was too quiet.  We tried it again after we heard there was an update and now the sound was fixed and we absolutely love it.I even dragged out an old monitor (that had audio out on it) and put it in my garage where my art room is and I have plenty of entertainment while I'm waiting for things to dry or when I'm taking a break.  I can even stream my music while i'm working.
author: D. K. Szwalkiewicz "dmoola"

review: Best $35 I ever spent for entertainment purposes. This gadget works exactly as claimed, perfect transmission, no problems whatsoever. Installs in five minutes, easy to understand instructions, can't find a thing to complain about.

review: I love Chromecast. So easy to use and set it up. I was watching the photos, movies on my big screen in no time.
author: RS "rsarkar5"

review: I purchased this with the idea of using aircast to stream my home videos & pictures to my living room tv. Google's new fail update has blocked third party apps from allowing you to play your own movies. Google has killed the chromecast. At this point, if you own an xbox or a ps3 your better off using those devices than the chromecast, there are no advantages to using the chromecast at this time. Maybe later on they will decide to allow third party apps, but so far its only good for hulu & netflix.
author: JC

review: The product is nice, hope to see more features and more support from other apps. Currently very limited ability to share and control only from youtube from mobile.
author: jt

review: I have been using the Chromecast device for about 3 weeks now and have been very impressed by it.  The device easily sets up and can stream Netflix movies quickly and efficiently.  I have also used it to stream media from other sites (abc.com, Fox.com, etc.) by streaming the tab in Google Chrome and making the media go to full screen.  Great streaming device for a great price.
author: Bryan Dvorak

review: Two drawbacks to the device:As described only certain apps can stream to it, so no true screen mirror.Image quality sometimes is not great, it seems to amplify the white in lighter colors during video play.

review: This item is good for pages with no video.  However when displaying video the images halt and do not appear to stream in a fluid manner.  I would not recommend this product.
